channel.title: Ffs!
channel.description: Ok guys, why is my armor on silabs client glitching out? I put bandos top on and it looks sweet as hell but in order to do that i need to put on third age platelegs which looks all glitchy, How do i get rid of the glitch on the items? Do i need to move thier spots on where they are placed or what?

item.title: Ffs!
item.dc:creator: @doodooss doodooss
item.description:
@doodooss wrote:

well she said that she fixed all the item glitches and i know what ur talking about cause it happened to me all u have to do is put it on then log out then back in take it off and the put back on and should b fixed if not i dont know

Read full topic
